nl: Get total revenue by region for all orders
gold_sql: SELECT region, SUM(quantity * price) AS total_revenue FROM orders GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT c.segment, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS order_count FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.segment

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, SUM(o.quantity * o.price) AS revenue FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.customer_name ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', order_date) AS month, SUM(quantity * price) AS revenue FROM orders WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = 2023 GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

nl: Average order value by product category
gold_sql: SELECT p.category, AVG(o.quantity * o.price) AS avg_order_value FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.category

nl: Customers who made more than 5 orders
gold_sql: SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.customer_name HAVING COUNT(o.order_id) > 5 ORDER BY order_count DESC

SELECT c.state, COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) AS customer_count, SUM(o.quantity * o.price) AS total_revenue, SUM(o.quantity * o.price) / COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) AS revenue_per_customer FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.state ORDER BY revenue_per_customer DESC

nl: Products that have never been ordered
gold_sql: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category FROM products p LEFT JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_id IS NULL
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) AS year, SUM(quantity * price) AS revenue FROM orders GROUP BY year ORDER BY year

nl: Top 5 regions by average order quantity
gold_sql: SELECT region, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY region ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC LIMIT 5
